title: Wondering if this computer could play LoL?
body:
Just seeing if this PC would be good enough for LoL to have a solid fps and be able to be smooth just a good PC for a decent 50-60 fps solid


-HP Compaq Presario CQ3420AN Desktop AMD Athlon II X2 220 2.8GHz 4GB RAM 500GB HDD Windows 7

-but instead adding a 128gb ssd

please reply thanks,

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like that machine doesn't have a dedicated GPU, you _should_ be able to run league, however I wouldn't be expecting too much.
